name: [PACKT] Spring MVC Cookbook
tagline: The blog the book and its CloudStreetMarket.com application
body:
### Welcome to [PACKT] Spring MVC Cookbook's blog!
This is the platform where can be found the latest news about the book.
[PACKT] Spring MVC Cookbook will be released during December 2015. Find more details on the publisher website: 
[Spring MVC Cookbook](https://www.packtpub.com/web-development/spring-mvc-cookbook)

### CloudStreetMarket.com
[CloudStreetMarket.com](https://github.com/alex-bretet/cloudstreetmarket.com) is a scalable Spring MVC showcase web-application developed with the book, chapter after chapter.
The project is maintained and hosted on [Github](https://github.com/alex-bretet/cloudstreetmarket.com) under a GPL license.
The app is virtual trading platform with social capabilities. More details can be already be found on the [Wiki](https://github.com/alex-bretet/cloudstreetmarket.com/wiki)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
